parties: To provide sea surface temperature (SST) boundary conditions for the CFMIP piSST-p4K experiment.

name: piControl SST Monthly Var Plus Uniform 4K
rationale: sea surface temperature, piControl, pre-industrial control, SST, monthly-varying, plus uniform SST 4K, SST +4K
longName: Monthly-varying sea surface temperatures from the pre-industrial control simulation plus uniform 4K
